sourceMeaningMnemonic: You keep your <radical>moon</radical> <radical>weapon</radical> in your <kanji>crotch</kanji>. Where else would you keep it?
meaningInfo: Your moon weapon is a moon that you keep in your crotch. We'll let you imagine how this one works...
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>crotch</kanji> has a moon weapon, and it's served you well, so you hope that if you have a <reading><ja>子</ja> </reading> (<ja>こ</ja>) one day, they'll have one too.
readingInfo: Your mother had a moon weapon, and her father before her. It's been in the family for generations, and you hope to pass it on to your <reading><ja>子</ja></reading> as well.
